short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add display to the YouTube watch page to show a view-to-like ratio or percentage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With YouTube dislikes on the way out, there needs to be an alternative way to judge a video's quality. This extension brings a solution by showing how often viewers decide to like a video. This metric can be useful when comparing videos of similar content or by the same creator.
